attributes.title: Do NOT download

attributes.title: THIS APP KILLED MY GOLD FISH 😭😰✨
attributes.review: I love my wonderful president ❤️and so I wanted to download his app.👍🏻 BIGGEST MISTAKE OF MY LIFE. 🙀As soon as I did my very own  GOLDFISH FLEW OUT THE WINDOW.😭 I WAS DEVASTATED AND HAD TO STOP SUPPORTING THIS MAN. 🍊Please keep your goldfish’s safe.😿 RIP goldy fly high ⚰️🤧💔

attributes.title: would leave it ZERO stars if i could

attributes.title: Terrible
attributes.review:
According to all known laws

of aviation,

  

there is no way a bee

should be able to fly.

  

Its wings are too small to get

its fat little body off the ground.

  

The bee, of course, flies anyway

  

because bees don't care

what humans think is impossible.

attributes.title: Rat fungus
attributes.review: AS SOON as I downloaded this app I got BITTEN by a RAT and had horrible pain on my left big toe, I then went to the doctors to check it out and now I have THIS RAT FUNGUS DISEASE AND I’M SLOWLY TURNING INTO A RATT 🙈🦄🍄🍑
